Name: Armor Elixir
Description: Brewed at Castle Village by Camilla. Fortifies the body.

DescriptionLocalization.de: Főzött Camilla kastélyfalujában. Erősíti a testet.
DescriptionLocalization.es: Elaborado en Castle Village por Camilla. Fortifica el cuerpo.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Brassée à Castle Village par Camilla. Fortifie le corps.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Főzött Camilla kastélyfalujában. Erősíti a testet.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Prodotta al Castle Village da Camilla. Rafforza il corpo.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: カミラがキャッスルビレッジで醸造。体を強化します。
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 카밀라가 캐슬 빌리지에서 양조했습니다. 몸을 강화합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Fabricada no Castelo Village por Camilla. Fortalece o corpo.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Приготовлено в замковой деревне Камиллой. Укрепляет организм.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Camilla tarafından Castle Village'de demlendi. Vücudu güçlendirir.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 卡米拉在城堡村酿造。强化身体。
